items.title: Corona Tracking Multipurpose Open Source Android App
items.author: Sunmughan
items.description:
Quarantine Alert is a mobile application that allows users to complete daily health checkups and receive personalized symptom assessments. If the user experiences symptoms in line with Covid19 Coronavirus then they can use the preventive isolation tips to quarantine themselves. We will add realtime patient tracker in next update to capture the live status of Covid19 positive patients.

App Features:

  • List the number of Corona suspects across the globe
  • Know about its symptoms and precautions
  • Get facts from YouTube about Corona
  • Get photos and upload information about Corona
  • Contribute or apply as Volunteer
  • Yoga tips to stay fit and healthy
  • Guidelines, Precautions, Emergency tips & Helplines
  • Isolation & Quarantine actions
  • Whatsapp and Telegram links of WHO and Indian Government on Coronavirus
  • Many more feature will be added on future updates

Modules of Quarantine Alert App

The app has three modules:

App Screenshots:

Contribution

If you want to contribute us in making the app better and more userful, you’re most welcome. Kindly contact me: sunmughan@gmail.com

Note

Download the source code of project from here: Github

Project Video: Youtube

Due to huge amount of projects i will not commit changes in this repository but i will keep releasing new updates here. Sources will be out if requested for educational or healthcare purpose with new changelogs.

Credits

  • Sunmughan Swamy
  • Gaurav Shukla
  • BalKrishna Swami

items.title: Vidhhya — Complete Online School Management Solution
items.author: Sunmughan
items.description:
Codeair has developed a unified solution for online school and learning. Vidhhya School Management ERP (Website + Admin Panel + Android/iOS Mobile Application) aims at easing administrative hassles and enhancing efficiency, and productivity. The Solution is cloud based and supports various modern technologies such as – Online payment gateway, RFID smart cards, biometric, mobile apps, email alerts, etc. School management software is agile and can be tailored according to the requirements of the institution.

Why School Management System Software?

Codeair believes that true breakthroughs in advancement are achieved when administrative and managerial activities are automated. As schools have comprehensive subjects and complex exam patterns; the need to go digital is paramount.

•• Empower teachers through the E-Learning Platform
•• Keep parents and students in the connectivity loop at all times, through SMS, Email and Mobile Apps
•• Go paperless, generate e- reports on a click of a button
•• Reduce the monotonous task of your administrative department. ERP will do the work for your school!
•• Track student en route, to and from home
•• Elegant website presence, to showcase your school’s vision and mission for education
•• School Library System to manage your library’s cataloguing, accessioning & circulation effortlessly
•• Online admissions for driving better efficiency & student enrollment
•• Online fee collection & payment portal integration for hassle-free e-payments

We have added biometric attendance support in Vidhhya School ERP for Zkteco/Ifcon/Local Indian Machines biometric device using this you should purchase Vidhhya School Biometric Attendance App (desktop application) from us directly because it will not sold individually in the market.

Whole new examination module with different patterns of exams:

  • Different types of exams
  • Subject selection of exams
  • Generate consolidated marksheet
  • Print professional marksheet
  • Print examination admit card
  • Import exam marks
  • Online examination
  • Custom fields for student and staff
  • Biometric device support for automated attendance
    Audit trail
  • Student online admission form
  • Period wise attendance
  • Flexible timetable schedule repeated subjects in a same day
  • Teachers Timetable
  • Add students in multiple class-sections
  • Auto generated admission number in pre define sequence
  • Multiple fees collection at same time
  • Fees Fine after due date
  • Discount and Fine in %
  • Fees Print Header Footer
  • Staff Salary Receipt Print Header Footer
  • Subject in absent notification for period wise attendance
  • Native Mobile app support
  • New payment gateways – Paystack, Flutterwave, Instamojo and Razorpay
  • Updated MSG91/Twillio library
  • Staff import
  • Library book import
  • Active multiple languages at same time
  • Apply leave for student
  • New frontend themes
  • New admin panel themes
  • Added Zoom Live Class addon
  • Lesson Plan module
  • Alumni module (Ex Students)
  • One Click Updater
  • Paytm and Midtrans payment gateway
  • Multi-class feature in Parent panel
  • Rich Text Editor in Question Bank
  • Online Examination Result in Parent Panel
  • Reference number in Online Admission Form
  • Polish language support
  • Audio/Video file upload support
  • Book Search in Library Book Issue
  • And many new features

Managing students and other resources are crucial for any school. Vidhhya helps you to manage everything in centralize way:

  1. Take student admission with powerful student admission form add 40+ records for student including previous school details. Add student siblings, RTE, IDs and multiple documents to maintain complete record in student profile.
  2. Search student with different criteria and keywords.
  3. Student profile consist 360* student record with admission, personal, contact, fees, exam and document details.
  4. Promote student in next academic session based on pass/fail and continue/leaving school.
  5. Categories students in as-section based on different criteria like caste, their skill ability etc.
  6. Most advanced fees collection mechanism to adopt any type of fees structure including fees type, fees groups, fees masters, free hand fees, due date, fine, discount, fees and discount allotment on more than 5 different criteria. State of the art fees collection page. Various fees reports.
  7. Manage school other income and expense head wise with receipt upload.
    √ Manage student attendance smartly in few clicks. Get attendance report monthly class-section wise.
  8. Complete examination management from exam create to exam schedule to marks entry to progress report with grades.
  9. Manage classes, section subjects, teacher, assign subject and create class timetable.
  10. Manage downloadable content for students, teacher like syllabus, assignments, study material etc.
  11. Complete library management system with books add, members add, books issue/return.
  12. Manage school vehicle/bus/van, routes, driver details.
    Manage school hostel, hostel rooms with room types.
  13. Send messages to students, parent and teachers through notice board.
  14. Get various reports based on students, fees statement, transaction, balance fees, attendance, exam.

PRICING: ₹3000/- ONLY (per month)
For sales enquiry and Demo, please contact on the below mentioned information:

Name: Sunmughan Swamy
Email: sunmughan@gmail.com
Phone/Whatsapp: +91-9584215603

You can google me to know about me before messanging me. :)

PDF Document available here:

  • Google Drive

You can visit this page for additional information on EdTech software development:

  • https://codeair.in/education-and-e-learning/
  • https://codeair.in

Once you're done, kindly let me know if you're interested in buying our service.
Thankyou so much for reading this email and sharing your time. I will be looking forward to hear from you. :)

Hashtags: #edtech #education #onlinelearning #lms #learningsolution #edtechsolution #onlinelearningsolution #learningmanagementsolution #learningmanagementsystem #exams #onlineexam #school #onlineschool #schoolerp #schoolmanagementsystem #schoolmanagementsoftware #schoolmanagementsystem #edtechstartups #edtechcompanies #edtechapps #edtechdeals

items.title: iConfy — Instant Free use video conferencing app for android
items.author: Sunmughan
items.description:
iConfy is a free video conferencing and video meeting app that allows you to communicate with your friends, family or colleagues with ease.

iConfy uses the free and open-source Jitsi Server in the backend to process and encrypt all the communication between users. Jitsi promises better quality and lower latency.

iConfy allows upto 100 participants in a single meeting. Create a meeting and invite others to join the meeting by sharing the meeting code right from the app. You can also rejoin previous meetings by browsing the meeting history.

Features of the app:

  • Easy and secure login using Google or sign up using email authentication.
  • Create meetings and share the meeting code directly from the app.
  • Join meetings easily using the meeting code.
  • Rejoin previous meetings by browsing the meeting history.
  • Secured meetings to make your conversations confidential.
  • Upto 100 participants can be added in a video conference
    Chat features during video conferencing.
  • Native Day/Night theme support.

Changelogs:

  • Layout fixes and minor upstreams
  • Night theme improved
  • Share button fixed
  • Integrated Deep Linking.
  • Users can join the meeting directly using the meeting link.
  • No need to enter the code manually.
  • Enabled YouTube Live Streaming
    Fixed the profile icon bug that appeared white when logged in using Email
  • Android Studio 4.x compatible
    If an unauthenticated user joins a meeting, the name of the user is shown as "Guest user".
  • Name changes automatically based on the app name.
  • Added a FAQs (Frequently Asked Questions) page.
  • Fixed all the warnings that were shown when the project was build.
    Added the option to make user authentication mandatory.
  • Removed the meeting code max length limit.
  • Now, users can use meeting codes having a length greater than ten.
Download the app from here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=codeair.conference.app

Here are some of the screenshots:

Use iConfy to quickly and easily connect with others, be it your friends and family or your colleagues while you are working from home. Share our app and help us grow :)

For recommendations and feature requests or feedback/suggestions kindly contact me on sunmughan@gmail.com
